Drumbeat

53m, (174') - Sleeps 11 Guests

  • Browse
  • Overview
  • Photos
  • Specifications
  • Request Information

Home › All Yachts › Drumbeat

One of the largest modern sailing yachts ever built, DRUMBEAT combines excellent sailing performance, sea worthiness and comfort in a unique one-level layout. In 2016 summer, DRUMBEAT is available for charter in Iceland, Greenland, Spitzberg and Norway from June onwards and will be available in the Baltic Sea in September. Spring/Summer 2017, DRUMBEAT will be located in Bermuda for the America's Cup

Formerly SALPERTON, this exquisite example of Dubois-designed Alloy yachts construction sailing superyacht is an award-winning charter yacht

At 53m (173' 11"), DRUMBEAT offers extremely spacious, luxury accommodation for 11 charter guests and comes complete with 10 crew to manage every charter request and requirement onboard. This luxury sailing yacht has a unique one-level layout, stretching from the aft deck through the saloon and dining area to the forward wheelhouse ‚Äì ideal for socialising and entertaining and perfect for charter.

Guest accommodation is for up to 11 charter guests in 5 Staterooms. The full beam Master Stateroom boasts king size bed, ensuite with jacuzzi bath and shower, walk-in wardrobe, seating area, desk and state-of-the-art entertainment system. There are two identical double cabins with seating area and two twin cabins (one with a pullman), all with ensuite facilities.

In any one of the three saloon areas, charter guests can enjoy the large-screen TV with DVD player and a vast library of DVDs, as well as high quality Bose surround sound system. There are two dining areas inside, and two aft deck al fresco dining spaces, plus the bridge deck for dining with 360-degree views to the horizon.

A large hydraulic swim platform with two ladders provides access to the water, which makes for easy enjoyment of the vast array of water toys including two sailing dinghies, two underwater Sea-Doo scooters, windsurfer, two sea kayaks, wakeboard, water skis, double doughnut, snorkelling and assorted fishing equipment. There are also two RIBs, one Castoldi 6.2m (21') RIB with 182hp engine and a 4.5m Avon RIB with 50hp outboard for towing water toys.

Having just undergone a major refit, luxury sailing yacht DRUMBEAT is in optimum condition to welcome charter guests in 2016.
